#PSFMI MI_Boot 

Final model that was selected by PSFMI (automatic) includes: 
Intercept, leeftijd, gender, open, transhiataal, dummy_neotx1, dummy_neotx3, T34, comorb_dm, dummy_Hblow, fev1_compl

```{r}
library(psfmi)
Myimp <- readRDS("./Myimp.rds")

finalmodel <- psfmi_lr(data=Myimp, nimp=10, impvar=".imp", Outcome="outcome", predictors=c("age", "gender", "open", "transhiatal", "dummy_Neotx1", "dummy_Neotx3", "T34", "comorb_dm", "dummy_Hblow", "fev1_compl"))

res_bootstrap <- psfmi_validate(finalmodel, int_val=TRUE, p.crit=1, nboot=500, val_method="MI_boot", cal.plot=TRUE, plot.indiv=FALSE)

res_bootstrap$stats_val
```
